# Aryabhatta Units

Aryabhatta Units is a lightweight Python library for unit conversions, inspired by the legacy of Aryabhata.

## Supported Categories
- Length
- Mass
- Time
- Area
- Volume
- Speed
- Force
- Energy
- Power
- Pressure
- Temperature
- Data & Data Rate
- Currency (static)

## Installation
```bash
pip install aryabhatta-units
```

## Usage
```python
import aryabhatta
aryabhatta.meter_to_km(5000)
```
